original: Cattāro satipaṭṭhānā, cattāro sammappadhānā, cattāro iddhipādā, pañcindriyāni, pañca
analyzed: cattāro satipaṭṭhānā cattāro sammappadhānā cattāro iddhipādā pañca indriyāni pañca

original: balāni, satta bojjhaṅgā, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, cattāro ariyamaggā, cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni, nibbānañca—
analyzed: balāni satta bojjhaṅgāḥ ariyaḥ aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggo cattāro ariya maggā cattāri ca sāmañña phalāni nibbānañca
lokam na pacca avamanti iti lokuttarā
lokam samatikkamma abhibhuyya tiṭṭhanti iti lokuttarā
